about.description:
HTCondor is a workload management system for high-throughput and
high-performance jobs. Like other full-featured batch systems, HTCondor
provides a job queuing mechanism, scheduling policy, priority scheme,
resource monitoring, and resource management. Users submit their
serial or parallel jobs to HTCondor, HTCondor places them into a queue,
chooses when and where to run the jobs based upon a policy, carefully
monitors their progress, and ultimately informs the user upon
completion.

name: htcondor
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.18.11
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: htcondor
    version: 8.9.3
source:
    patches:
        - boost-1.68.0.patch
        - paths.patch
        - python-archlib.patch
        - python3-libname.patch
        - python3.patch
        - rpath.patch
    sha256: 40c01d5284a610bc840c00ffaaf825a9b604e2f5ff4945390975d487c13782e8
    url: https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/archive/V8_9_3.tar.gz
build:
    noarch: false
    number: '1'
    string: py38_1
requirements:
    host:
        - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 main
        - ca-certificates 2019.9.11 hecc5488_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 he1b5a44_1006
        - libgcc-ng 9.1.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libstdcxx-ng 9.1.0 hdf63c60_0
        - ncurses 6.1 hf484d3e_1002
        - openssl 1.1.1d h516909a_0
        - python 3.8.0 h357f687_4
        - readline 8.0 hf8c457e_0
        - sqlite 3.30.1 hcee41ef_0
        - tk 8.6.10 hed695b0_0
        - xz 5.2.4 h14c3975_1001
        - zlib 1.2.11 h516909a_1006
    run:
        - htcondor-classads 8.9.3 he1b5a44_1
        - htcondor-procd 8.9.3 he1b5a44_1
        - htcondor-utils 8.9.3 hf10cc52_1
        - libcondor_utils 8.9.3 hae2777f_1
        - python >=3.8,<3.9.0a0
        - python-htcondor 8.9.3 py38h3e4de3e_1
test:
    commands:
        - export CONDOR_CONFIG=/dev/null
        - condor_q --version
    imports:
        - classad
        - htcondor
about:
    description: 'HTCondor is a workload management system for high-throughput and

        high-performance jobs. Like other full-featured batch systems, HTCondor

        provides a job queuing mechanism, scheduling policy, priority scheme,

        resource monitoring, and resource management. Users submit their

        serial or parallel jobs to HTCondor, HTCondor places them into a queue,

        chooses when and where to run the jobs based upon a policy, carefully

        monitors their progress, and ultimately informs the user upon

        completion.

        '
    dev_url: https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor
    doc_url: https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/
    home: http://htcondor.org/
    license: Apache-2.0
    license_family: APACHE
    license_file: LICENSE-2.0.txt
    summary: 'HTCondor: High Throughput Computing'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
        - jasoncpatton
